contents:
名言鑑賞

"Now, there's no question China has been trying to crack down on the Internet -- good luck. That's sort of like trying to nail Jello to the wall. " - Bill Clinton

“China is going to eat our lunch? Come on, man. I mean, you know, they’re not bad folks, folks. But guess what? They’re not competition for us.” - Joe Biden

"Xi Jinping is not a dictator" - Mike Bloomberg

建制派都是一個吊樣，夫復何求？擁抱熊貓派揚眉吐氣，繼續恰爛錢，給中國輸送彈藥，中國再拿來打回給美國
